name: Spring 3D Object
summary: Learn about .S3O files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Only games using the Spring RTS game engine and its forks (e.g., SpringBAR) use the S3O format. Therefore, you will likely only find them in the installation directory of a Spring RTS game.

While most gamers will never encounter S3O files, modders may open and edit them and place them back in the original location. Modders may also create S3O files from scratch or other 3D models and export them as S3O files for game use.

instructions: S3O files are not meant to be opened. Instead, the game the S3O files are packaged with loads the files during gameplay.
However, if you are looking to modify models of characters or objects in a game, you can open S3O files with Blender (with an S3O plugin).

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
